title: How to Send a Broadcast Message on WhatsApp

steps.title: Tap on contacts to select them as recipients of the message.
steps.content: Tap on contacts to select them as recipients of the message. You can send a broadcast message to a maximum of 256 contacts.

steps.title: Confirm your selection of recipients.
steps.content: Confirm your selection of recipients. The "Done" button will change to reflect the number of recipients you have selected for your broadcast message, out of a maximum of 25. Tap this button.

steps.title: Type your message and attach a photo, video, location, or contact if you wish.
steps.content: Type your message and attach a photo, video, location, or contact if you wish.

steps.title: Tap "Send" to send your Broadcast Message.
steps.content: Tap "Send" to send your Broadcast Message.
